attributes.action: Make London Tier 3 at the start of February
attributes.background:
The City of London is the functioning heart of the United Kingdom and requires more leniency for the economy to continue to function.

As this petition suggests, we should make London tier 3 for the start of February. How many more lockdowns for us to realise they don’t work.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want London to be exempt from the National Lockdown, or for it to be in Tier 3 when the lockdown ends. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
